document.full_text: nato should have complete command of military operations in libya "in a couple of days," but a spokeswoman said the alliance saw no military solution to the crisis and hoped for a political settlement.
document.title: nato to take full command of libya mission in days
lines_and_colors: nato should have complete command of military operations in libya "in a couple of days," but a spokeswoman said the alliance saw no military solution to the crisis and hoped for a political settlement.
